DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to characterize the analgesic properties of single dose study of HKT-500 in subjects with pain caused by mild to moderate OA of the knee
DOC.brief_title: HKT-500-US12 In Adult Patients With OA Knee Pain
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Single Dose Study of the Analgesic Properties of HKT-500 and Placebo in Subjects with Pain Caused by Mild to Moderate Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: male or female 45 years of age or older with osteoarthritis of the knee subject is a woman of childbearing potential who has a positive urine pregnancy test, is lactating, or who is not surgically sterile
